message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to find something within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $100?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $110. It's a great deal, considering the value this product brings.
